title: Blender 3.1 update adds Metal GPU rendering for M1 Macs
content:
The popular open-source 3D software Blender has just been updated to version 3.1, and the update brings important improvements – especially for Mac users. Blender 3.1 now has Metal GPU rendering for Macs with the M1 chip and its variants.

more…

The post Blender 3.1 update adds Metal GPU rendering for M1 Macs appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Blender 3.1 now has Metal GPU rendering for Macs with the M1 chip. The app renders up to 2x faster compared to standard CPU rendering.
